summary: RuneScape's mining guild... now in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://creationkit.com.br/images/mods/mining-guild/mod_banner.png[/img]
[b]RuneScape's most important guild. Now in Skyrim.[/b][/center]
[b][i]About[/i]
[/b]I played RuneScape for many years. In fact, RuneScape is the reason I love TES so much. And, as any RuneScape player, one of my main goals (the main goal being completing The Monkey Madness, which, by the way, I was never able to complete) was to reach a Mining level of 60 to join the Mining Guild. But there's a problem with Skyrim: it doesn't have a Miners' Guild. Now it does! This mod aims to add a new Guild to the game, with lots of quests for you to do. Also, as it is based on RuneScape, I aim to bring Runite, Mithril and Adamantite ores to Skyrim, as well as weapons and armor made of these minerals. Lots of new NPCs, including companions and merchants, amazing quests, new dungeons and enemies. Also: prepare yourself to slaughter evil Zamorak Cultists! Saradomin bless!

[b][i]Note
[/i][/b]This mod is in its extreme alpha stage, and although it is currently stable and without bugs, the only thing you will find is ore veins. We are in need of voice actors, level designers, scripters and writers to help us develop the mod. Also, if you find any problems, don't hesitate to report. If you have any suggestions, feel free to share them! Suggestions are always welcome! Thank you, guys!

[b][i]Features[/i][/b]
[list][*]A whole new building[/*]
[*]A bartender[/*]
[*]Miners and other NPCs[/*]
[*]Merchants[/*]
[*]Lots of veins for you to mine your ores[/*]
[*]A whole new forge and smelter[/*]
[/list]
[b][i]Links[/i][/b]
[list][*][b][url=http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/573-mining-guild/][color=#ffffff]The mod's forums[/color][/url][/b][/*]
[*][b][url=http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/578-development/][color=#ffffff]Development[/color][/url][/b][/*]
[*][b][url=http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/574-announcements/][color=#ffffff]Announcements[/color][/url][/b][/*]
[*][b][url=http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/577-suggestions-applications/][color=#ffffff]Suggestions & Applications[/color][/url][/b][/*]
[*][b][url=http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/575-general-discussion/][color=#ffffff]General Discussion[/color][/url][/b][/*]
[/list]
[b][i]FAQ[/i][/b]
[list][*]Why are there no interactions with the NPCs?
[b]A:[/b] Because this mod is still being developed. Future releases will contain lots of new interactions with NPCs and the guild itself. It will become an actual guild.[/*]
[*]Are there any enemies?
[b]A:[/b] No, none yet. But there will be.[/*]
[*]Where is the guild located?
[b]A:[/b] Check the mod's album. There's a screenshot with the exact location.[/*]
[/list]


[center][b][i]Other mods of mine[/i]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40849][color=#d3d3d3]Domus Imperatoris[/color][/url][color=#d3d3d3] | [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48764][color=#d3d3d3]Mining Guild[/color][/url][color=#d3d3d3] | [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41567][color=#d3d3d3]Zumul Thu'um[/color][/url][/b][/center]
author: thaalesalves
